website_summaries.verdict: An affordable flea and tick collar by a trusted brand that's suitable for adult dogs.
pros: Can prevent fleas and ticks for up to seven months
Has been known to work quickly, especially when combined with other Adams products such as the brand's flea and tick shampoo and home spray
cons: May not work for all dogs, and some may be sensitive to it

customer_reviews.title: Effective remedy
customer_reviews.text: I was basically frustrated with fleas despite placing Frontline plus drops on my 3 dogs every month and capstar treatment when they are itching, and I'm also getting bit, so I decided to try to this collar. The price is right. Immediately they stopped the severe scratching. But I did take 1 star off for the smell, it smells like chemicals. I placed it loosely around their neck so it doesn't cause skin irritation, and taped the end without cutting it, the strap is super long. I remove it when I give them baths. I did stretch it to release the powder, I believe this releases the active ingredient. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Aggressively loaded with chemicals
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this because we were having an infestation of fleas, but the chemical smell is incredibly strong and it made two of my dogs nauseated. If you try it, just make sure to keep a close eye on your animals, including checking the skin around the collar for irritation
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.. Fleas all over my babies..
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing... I’ve been using Adams flea collars on my 2 dogs for yrs and I got this order and they have had them on over a week and there’s fleas crawling all over them!! They are scratching and you can tell uncomfortable.. So I ordered Frontline hopefully that will help my babies.. Waste of money down the drain.. Never again Adams...
customer_reviews.author: Kgator001

customer_reviews.title: Threw it out
customer_reviews.text: My dog does better with collars but I had to throw it out without using. It was crusted in white residue.
customer_reviews.author: Terry G

customer_reviews.title: Pet had a bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: I think it was effective in keeping the tics and fleas away but after a week of wearing my dog became lethargic and presented with neurological systems. I removed the collar and gave him a good scrub and he slowly return to normal
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and very effective! My dog needed a flea collar and this was very helpful in helping her cure her flea problem. Within days, I noticed her not itching and biting herself as much.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Flores

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!! They were all nasty and crusty when we opened the package like they were 10 years old. Did not work at all. Fir the first time since we've had our dogs (9&10 years now) both dogs actually got fleas! WTH?!? Stick with the Hertz brand at Walmart that costs half as much and actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lynn

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Gave my dog a bath first, put the collar on when he was dry, around 5 pm. At 7 pm he started sneezing. He did this off and on for almost 2 hours. I then removed the collar. He stopped sneezing. The next day he had 2 sores on his neck. This was a week ago and still has the sores on his neck. This collar might be alright for some dogs, but not for my baby
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Collar at great price
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has long thick fur. The collar helped but we still had to take him to the vet for flea treatment. The price is much better than some other collars and works equally well. However you may still need professional support if you have a major infestation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising and horrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: Received this flea collar today and not only is it crusted, but the label says for 12 weeks and older. The advertisement shows the label as saying 6 weeks and older. That is the only reason I bought it. My puppy is too young for the Credelio that it older dog is on and we need something to help with forward until she's old enough. Complete waste of money if all they are doing is lying about the product and sending old nasty, crusty product! If I could give 0 stars I would!
customer_reviews.author: rlparker1982

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: We live on a farm and have 2 dogs that work and live outside bought these to try last year and just ordered again they work great very good value for the money I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my mastiff! She didn't know i even put it on but i was worried that the white powder stuff was gonna ruin her other collar but so far it hasn't. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kelina kessner

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if these are old, or not really Adam's flea and tick collars..
customer_reviews.text: They don't have any active stuff in them...the dang squirrels keep bringing fleas in my yard..dogs pick them up...endless cycle of spray/bathe/collars/spray, etc....yikes.
customer_reviews.author: calamityj

customer_reviews.title: adams flea collar.
customer_reviews.text: i have always heard Adam flea collars were the best . Not in my case..i bought a flea collar for our chihuahua..she has worn it about three wks..i noticed last night the fleas were gathered under the collar.....i also purchaed the harts collars for our two other dogs they were alot better..sorry...
customer_reviews.author: william campbell

customer_reviews.title: This collar was not good
customer_reviews.text: It looked old and had crusty minerally deposits on it, like it was old or had gotten wet and was repackaged. I wasn't impressed at all and would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Allergic dogs... proceed with caution
customer_reviews.text: My dog was severely allergic as he's a small white mix (possibly Bichon???). I had no idea this was common with these guys. I gave one star for the product as I believe there should be some information regarding allergies and/warning. In addition, one star for value as with my experience I had to donate them.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't keep fleas off of our two Maltese. I went to a natural deterrent which worked much better. I will not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeshopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fight as well as expected
customer_reviews.text: I liked this collar for a bit. I was originally gifted this and when I took it off to bathe my dog I lost it and reordered it. I had my first one for 5 months and it didn't help much. Second one broke and I couldn't fasten it with how short it became so it was a waste for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stian H

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money - useless
customer_reviews.text: Both small dogs , under 20 lbs, still have fleas around the rear end area. Waste of money and our vet said the same thing!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE WORST FLEA COLLAR I HAVE EVER BOUGHT. IT DOESNT WORK!!! MY DOG HAS MORE FLEAS NOW THAN SHE EVER DID.. I WILL NEVER BUY ADAMS PRODUCTS AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen King

customer_reviews.title: Good does collar
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in hand for emergencies. They are are good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: don't like crooks

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all . Made animals for come off.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Saw no difference in flea control. Switched to different product.
customer_reviews.author: vs

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product .. great value .. sams cost as buying in store and delivered to my door.. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: johnsmom

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really do much against the fleas that my cats picked up from the vet and transferred to my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Found a tick!
customer_reviews.text: We found a tick on our dog while he had this on. He had it on for at least two weeks before we found the engorged tick on him.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Dog flea collar.
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my dog all the time. They are well worth the money. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Janet V.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work if anything aggravated the fleas lol. Because the following day they were scratching more then ever
customer_reviews.author: Spawn

customer_reviews.title: I think it's working...
customer_reviews.text: Found a flea the other day. My 3 dogs use flea drops and the flea collars. I must have fleas outside, so I am not sure if the product is working or not. I guess one fleas not bad compared to prior to the collar.
customer_reviews.author: M KELLY

customer_reviews.title: USELESS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not help at all! We bought 3 and they were absolutely useless!. Don't bother wasting your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree H

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: My dog was scratching away didnt see the desired effects.. disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Landell Poleon

customer_reviews.title: Not working too good
customer_reviews.text: They must have changed something in the formula- my dogs are still chewing at themselves even with the collars.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Perkins

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this on my pup for about 2-3 days now and I don’t see any changes at all. He’s still scratching so much and I see the fleas crawling on him still which makes the product ineffective! A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: stacey ricafort

customer_reviews.title: NOT!  Not effective.
customer_reviews.text: Dog's had fleas. Sprayed them down to kill the fleas, put these collars on...re-infestation! Spend more money!!! I now spend around $13-15 per collar and they definitely work.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin P.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the Hart’s products, so tried this one based on reviews and it was a no go for my dog. Still scratching etc.
customer_reviews.author: CNYC

customer_reviews.title: Great product works well
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these flea coolers so far working very well
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Lane

customer_reviews.title: Just did not work
customer_reviews.text: I read instructions. I stretched it till my hands had powder on them. This product did not work. I am in Texas. Small yard. I have seen more fleas on my dog than ever. This product did nothing to help.
customer_reviews.author: Plymouthfury3

customer_reviews.title: Did not do the job - maybe eliminated some of ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not do the job - maybe eliminated some of the fleas but on my Rottweiler and Mastweiler, they appeared to just move away from the collar to the back end of the dog - they are still itchy and scratching and I can see live fleas...
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works and easy to under. Only complaint is it comes off often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer for a really long time

customer_reviews.title: Did not kill fleas
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the collar worked at first, but fleas are still on dogs....not as many but enough to have them still scratching. I think its only for one month.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Alice Garza

customer_reviews.title: The product doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Not good, I bought 10 and the people who used it say that does not work, I buy one before and works perfectly but was for a different seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT work. Found fleas on my dog while wearing the collar about a month in and he had no fleas before collar. Had high hopes for this. I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shana jatis

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help
customer_reviews.text: didn’t help at all found 2 ticks at lower jaw area yesterday where he have collar on and it is just couple weeks old and should last 5-7 months, all white out from water and play time
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the suspiciously inexpensive pricing, it seems to be working! I put it on my pet about two months ago, and is still holding up!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to figure out, but it did not repellent ticks!
customer_reviews.author: Human 97

customer_reviews.title: Stuff to old and crusty wast of money
customer_reviews.text: All crusty when recieved looked like it was really old and nasty had to throw it away bought a different one at the store instand
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, my dogs still suffer from flea and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bad product, my dogs still suffer from flea and it's been a week since they are using this products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.text: FITS MY PUP PRETTY WELL AND IT IS STILL ON HIM.
customer_reviews.author: BMOSJD

customer_reviews.title: my dogs have more fleas now than before i used this product
customer_reviews.text: my dogs have had these collars on now for a week and i hav'nt seen one dead flea A WASTE OF MONEY i would never buy again!

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and adjust fits all my animals

customer_reviews.title: Not Working
customer_reviews.text: My dog still have fleas. I am not satisfied from this product.
customer_reviews.author: yakir1114

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a flea and Tick collar and I received ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a flea and Tick collar and I received a Training collar and I can not return the product cause I am in Dominican Republic.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette Portes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: These did not work ONE BIT! Steer clear of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Uhm dog flea/tick collar. It like kills fleas and ticks.May be better but not at this price
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep the fleas at bay
customer_reviews.text: Great product my dog has not had any fleas since he has worn this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: USELESS
customer_reviews.text: These are totally useless collars. My vet threw it away, said it only killed fleas that are underneath the collar. I ordered 5 of them, waste of money. Going to try to get a refund, but doubt they will do anything.
customer_reviews.author: gayle buchan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: unsure if it work or not. My dog still stress out.
customer_reviews.author: Theone Ly

customer_reviews.title: This collar actually works!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy got fleas, so I ordered the Adams flea shampoo and this collar. The shampoo killed the fleas, and this collar repelled any new fleas from getting on her. I like how easy it was to use. The scent was initially very strong, but after a few weeks the scent disappeared completely. Hands down the best collar I have ever purchased. It actually works! Remember to replace a few times a year! More often if you dog is super active and goes swimming as the powder in the collar wears out more quickly. For as affordable as it is, I do not mind one bit!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: No fleas on my dogs, with these collars!!
customer_reviews.text: I put these collars on my 3 dogs at the start of summer and still no fleas/ticks on any of them. I live in the country, so this product really impressed me. Reasonable price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen McCaffrey

customer_reviews.title: Fleas
customer_reviews.text: I use a piece to put in my vacuum top recent fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

product_meta.title: Adams Flea and Tick Collar for Dogs
product_meta.description: The Adams Flea and Tick Collar for Dogs kills adult fleas and ticks for up to 7 months. The active ingredient works its way to the surface of the collar and is rubbed onto the fur of the animal. The active ingredient moves through the oils and from hair to hair to cover the entire body and works even when wet. This collar can be fitted for all dogs with necks up to 26".
feature_bullets: Provides 7-month protection against adult fleas and ticks
